----- Original Message ---- 
From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 

> Perceptor: 
>
> PErceptor attached an specuial device toa computer and sarted to 
> scan the base also, send commends to sink the base again in the lava 
> lake and that drones started to repair damaged areas 
>
> OOC: Told me if PErcepto could find somthing Preston 

The base appeares to once again be under Predacon control. It no longer makes any attempts to raise or open its doors. As to the scans around the base, it is not difficult to locate the spider spies once full sensors are on, the more intensive scanners locate them fairly quickly. It is obvious that due to thier small size and elusive nature, passive sensors would have most likely not detect the spider spies.  

One spy is located in the shuttle bay, the other near the planning room. 

Preston
